content: point of the shoulder base or the first left and eighth right bbsc of round 1 of the body the thumbs and fingers should point forward and upward when the arm swings forward the ending tail of the arm may need to be reinserted and exited through another stitch gap on round 6 to avoid twisting the arm take the ending tail of the arm and run it behind and around the single_crochet at the shoulder base and back into the arm at the same stitch gap and around the next single_crochet on the arm repeat twice or thrice tie off and bury the knot down into the arm trim the excess sew the head to the body position the head so darksol s blue face is centered on the shoulder base above the white section of the body sew the head in place bring the tail out through a stitch gap in the head tie off and bury the knot into the head trim off any excess armor chest plate with gray chain 3 row 1 bbsc in second chain from hook bbsc turn = 2 bbsc row 2 chain 1 blosc increase x2 turn = 4 blosc row 3 chain 1 4 single_crochet turn = 4 single_crochet row 4 chain 1 blosc increase 2 blosc blosc increase turn = 6 blosc row 5 chain 1 6 single_crochet turn = 6 single_crochet row 6 chain 1 blosc increase 4 blosc blosc increase turn = 8 blosc row 7 chain 1 8 single_crochet = 8 single_crochet bobble row 8 slip_stitch join into second single_crochet of row 7 blosc in same st 4 blosc do not work last single_crochet turn = 6 blosc row 9 chain 1 6 single_crochet = 6 single_crochet bobble darksol diminutive devil king 7 cape front with blue chain 11 row 1 blosc in second chain from hook 9 blosc turn = 10 blosc row 2 chain 1 10 blosc = 10 blosc bobble bring the end tail up through the previous row so it exits out of the starting chain pauldrons shoulder guards make two with gray chain 2 row 1 3 bbsc into second chain from hook turn = 3 bbsc row 2 chain 1 single_crochet 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet turn = 5 single_crochet row 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet turn = 7 single_crochet row 4 chain 1 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet single_crochet increase turn = 9 single_crochet row 5 chain 1 9 single_crochet turn = 9 single_crochet row 6 chain 1 single_crochet increase 7 single_crochet single_crochet increase = 11 single_crochet bobble leave a long tail for sewing weave-in the ends of the starting chains spikes make six see special stitches and techniques i-cord with gray create six i-cord spikes each four row high before bobble bring the bobble end down towards the starting end but do not weave in or trim yet sew the spikes to the pauldrons each pauldron has a set of three spikes to be sewn
